title: Sleight of Paw
description: Minnesota librarian Kathleen Paulson realized her mind wasn't playing tricks, that her cats have magical abilities. When elderly Agatha Shepherd is found near her favorite local caf√©, she knows Owen's talent for turning invisible and Hercules's ability to walk through walls will give the felines access to clues. Someone is hiding dark secrets and it will take furtive investigating to catch the killer.
author: Sofie Kelly
